article.title: ITT to Provide Electronic Warfare Technology to Oman Royal Air Force
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ITT Corporation, Clifton, New Jersey, is being awarded a $47,530,000 firm-fixed-price contract to procure 15 AN/ALQ-211(V); four airborne integrated defensive electronic warfare suites; and two sets of antenna couplers for support production. The effort is in support of the Royal Air Force Oman F-16 C/D model production aircraft. Warner Robins Air Logistics Center, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
